title: Grades Pre-K, K, 1, 2, 3, 4
subject: Health, Physical Education, and Family & Consumer Science (1996-)

document.title: Learning Standards for Health, Physical Education, and Family and Consumer Sciences

E54FB530DFE60131C2D568A86D17958E.description: know the different jobs in their communities and the contributions made by individuals performing those jobs.

E55005F0DFE60131C2D668A86D17958E.description: understand how people acquire, use, and protect money and recognize some factors that influence spending

E54F6B80DFE60131C2D468A86D17958E.description: understand the kinds of resources available in their community and make informed decisions related to their own use

E54F1C20DFE60131C2D368A86D17958E.description: Students will understand and be able to manage personal resources of talent, time, energy, and money and make effective decisions in order to balance their obligations to work, family, and self. They will nurture and support positive relationships in their homes, workplaces, and communities. They will develop and use their abilities to contribute to society through pursuit of a career and commitment to long-range planning for their personal, professional, and academic futures. They will know and access community resources.

E54D9180DFE60131C2CD68A86D17958E.description: demonstrate the ability to apply the decision making process to physical activity.

E54CFA50DFE60131C2CB68A86D17958E.description: become discriminating consumers of fitness information, health-related fitness activities in their communities, and fitness and sports equipment

E54D3A00DFE60131C2CC68A86D17958E.description: know that resources available at home and in the community offer opportunities to participate in and enjoy a variety of physical activities in their leisure time

E54CB6B0DFE60131C2CA68A86D17958E.description: Students will be aware of and able to access opportunities available to them within their community to engage in physical activity. They will be informed consumers and be able to evaluate facilities and programs. Students will also be aware of some career options in the field of physical fitness and sports.

E54E5FE0DFE60131C2D068A86D17958E.description: recognize how the media influences health choices.

E54E1F40DFE60131C2CF68A86D17958E.description: know how to access help when illness, injury, or emergency situations occur

E54E9DE0DFE60131C2D168A86D17958E.description: understand how culture contributes to individual family and community beliefs and practices affecting health

E54EDD00DFE60131C2D268A86D17958E.description: identify characteristics of valid health information and health-promoting products and services and know where to locate them

E54DDBE0DFE60131C2CE68A86D17958E.description: Students will understand the influence of culture, media, and technology in making decisions about personal and community health issues. They will know about and use valid health information, products, and services. Students will advocate for healthy families and communities.

E54C70F0DFE60131C2C968A86D17958E.description: Students will understand and be able to manage their personal and community resources.

E54C2A50DFE60131C2C868A86D17958E.description: know some conditions necessary for a safe and healthy home and school environment and recognize the various ways individuals contribute to that environment.

E54BC650DFE60131C2C768A86D17958E.description: understand some basic requirements of nurturing people of various ages, and demonstrate appropriate ways to interact with them

E54B74D0DFE60131C2C668A86D17958E.description: Students will know the basic principles of home and community safety. They can demonstrate the skills necessary to maintain their homes and workplaces in a safe and comfortable condition. They can provide a safe and nurturing environment for themselves and others.

E54984B0DFE60131C2BF68A86D17958E.description: demonstrate care, consideration, and respect of self and others during physical activity.

E549C230DFE60131C2C068A86D17958E.description: know how injuries from physical activity can be prevented or treated

E54902E0DFE60131C2BD68A86D17958E.description: work constructively with others to accomplish a variety of goals and tasks

E548C3C0DFE60131C2BC68A86D17958E.description: come to know and practice appropriate participant and spectator behaviors to produce a safe and positive environment

E5494390DFE60131C2BE68A86D17958E.description: contribute to a safe and healthy environment by observing safe conditions for games, recreation, and outdoor activities

E54881B0DFE60131C2BB68A86D17958E.description: Students will demonstrate responsible personal and social behavior while engaged in physical activity. They will understand that physical activity provides the opportunity for enjoyment, challenge, self-expression, and communication. Students will be able to identify safety hazards and react effectively to ensure a safe and positive experience for all participants.

E54B2C20DFE60131C2C568A86D17958E.description: recognize characteristics of the environment that contribute to health.

E54AE240DFE60131C2C468A86D17958E.description: know some personal and social skills which contribute to individual safety

E54A5690DFE60131C2C268A86D17958E.description: recognize potentially dangerous situations and know how to avoid or reduce their risk

E54A1210DFE60131C2C168A86D17958E.description: Students will demonstrate personally and socially responsible behaviors. They will care for and respect themselves and others. They will recognize threats to the environment and offer appropriate strategies to minimize them.

E54838C0DFE60131C2BA68A86D17958E.description: Students will acquire the knowledge and ability necessary to create and maintain a safe and healthy environment.

E5440F40DFE60131C2AB68A86D17958E.description: recognize how a family contributes to personal health.

E5438120DFE60131C2A968A86D17958E.description: use simple household tools safely to perform a variety of everyday tasks

E543C660DFE60131C2AA68A86D17958E.description: understand the importance of nutritious food and how it contributes to good health, make simple nutritious food choices, and assist with basic food preparation

E54336A0DFE60131C2A868A86D17958E.description: Students will use an understanding of the elements of good nutrition to plan appropriate diets for themselves and others. They will know and use the appropriate tools and technologies for safe and healthy food preparation.

E54694B0DFE60131C2B468A86D17958E.description: understand the relationship between physical activity and individual well being.

E5471170DFE60131C2B668A86D17958E.description: demonstrate and assess their fitness by performing exercises or activities related to each health-related fitness component, and establish personal goals to improve their fitness

E5478A50DFE60131C2B868A86D17958E.description: understand the effects of activity on the body, the risks associated with inactivity, and the basic components of health-related fitness (cardiovascular, muscle strength, muscle endurance, flexibility, and body composition)

E547E360DFE60131C2B968A86D17958E.description: demonstrate mastery of fundamental motor, nonlocomotor, and manipulative skills, and understand fundamental principles of movement

E5474E60DFE60131C2B768A86D17958E.description: develop physical fitness skills through regular practice, effort, and perseverance

E546D460DFE60131C2B568A86D17958E.description: participate in physical activities (games, sports, exercises) that provide conditioning for each fitness area

E5464920DFE60131C2B368A86D17958E.description: Students will perform basic motor and manipulative skills. They will attain competency in a variety of physical activities and proficiency in a few select complex motor and sports activities. Students will design personal fitness programs to improve cardiorespiratory endurance, flexibility, muscular strength, endurance, and body composition.

E5460DF0DFE60131C2B268A86D17958E.description: practice and support others in making healthy choices.

E545D270DFE60131C2B168A86D17958E.description: know about some diseases and disorders and how they are prevented and treated

E5459630DFE60131C2B068A86D17958E.description: recognize influences which affect health choices and behaviors

E544A600DFE60131C2AD68A86D17958E.description: understand how behaviors such as food selection, exercise, and rest affect growth and development

E5455460DFE60131C2AF68A86D17958E.description: possess basic knowledge and skills which support positive health choices and behaviors

E54511B0DFE60131C2AE68A86D17958E.description: know how basic body systems work and interrelate in normal patterns of growth and development

E5445310DFE60131C2AC68A86D17958E.description: Students will understand human growth and development and recognize the relationship between behaviors and healthy development. They will understand ways to promote health and prevent disease and will demonstrate and practice positive health behaviors.

E542E6E0DFE60131C2A768A86D17958E.description: Students will have the necessary knowledge and skills to establish and maintain physical fitness, participate in physical activity, and maintain personal health.
